categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Navy (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Imperial Fleet Command was the primary leadership of the Imperial Navy, overseeing the operations of the reconstituted Sith Empire's fleets.
During the Cold War in 3643 BBY, Flight Commander Pirul of Fleet Command recruited a handful of Sith, Imperial, and Mandalorian for the newly formed Empire's Fury squadron.
Around 3641 BBY, Omana Tragg, representative of the Isen IV mining colony, offered to discuss terms of surrender with Fleet Command, noting several of their victories in the sector.
